篴字的基本解释

篴
zhú
古书上说的一种竹。

篴
dí
古同“笛”。

篴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dí］
［《廣韻》徒歷切，入錫，定。］
“笛1”的古字。“笛1”的今字。亦作“1”。
管乐器名。

篴字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页895第42
【廣韻】徒歷切【集韻】亭歷切，?音狄。【說文】七孔筩也。【周禮·春官】笙師掌敎龡竽、笙、塤、籥、簫、箎、篴、管，舂牘應雅，以敎祴樂。【疏】杜子春讀篴爲蕩滌之滌，云今時所吹五空竹篴。【釋名】篴，滌也，其聲滌滌然也。通作笛。　又【廣韻】直六切，音逐。竹名。

考證：〔【周禮·春官】笙師掌敎龡竽笙塤籥簫篴管，春牘應雅，以敎械樂。〕　謹照原文簫下增箎字。械樂改祴樂。

篴字的起名意思

[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　篴; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 895 No. 42
[Guang Yun] Tu Li Qi [Ji Yun] Pavilion Li Qi,? Yin Di. [Said the text] Seven holes and 筩 also. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Master Sheng holds the hands of the scorpion, sheng, xun, 籥, flute, 篪, 篴, pipe, and the 牍牍 should be elegant, in order to bring joy. [Sparse] Du Zichun's reading of the bamboo sticks is the cleansing of the wash, and the five empty bamboo sticks are blown by the cloud today. [Release name] 篴, cleans up, and cleans up the sound. Pass as a flute.　[Guangyun] Straight six cuts, sound by tone. Bamboo name. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Master Sheng is in charge of the scorpion of the scorpion, the scorpion of the scorpion, the scorpion of the scorpion, the spring should be elegant, and the music can be played. 〕　I would like to add the characters under the flute according to the original.
